name: Flying The Most Dangerous Airline in the World? Kazakhstan's Former Blacklisted Airline SCAT Air!
description:
What's it like flying the most dangerous airline in the world? I took a flight with a former EU blacklisted airline called SCAT Airlines in Kazakhstan, and hilarity ensued!
